name: Great Wall of China
description: An ancient series of walls and fortifications in northern China.

name: Machu Picchu
description: A 15th-century Inca citadel located in the Andes Mountains of Peru.

name: Taj Mahal
description: An ivory-white marble mausoleum in Agra, India, built by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: The iconic pyramids built by ancient Egyptians, located in Giza, Egypt.

name: Colosseum
description: A large amphitheater in Rome, Italy, built during the Roman Empire.

name: Mount Fuji
description: An active volcano and Japan's tallest mountain, located near Tokyo.

name: Stonehenge
description: A prehistoric monument consisting of a ring of standing stones in Wiltshire, England.

name: Christ the Redeemer
description: An iconic statue of Jesus Christ in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: A wrought-iron lattice tower in Paris, France, and a global cultural icon.

name: Banff National Park
description: Canada's oldest national park, located in the Rocky Mountains of Alberta.
